Media outlets referred to the video as: real" footage or "evidence" of the Balakot airstrike.
The video was labeled as a: promotional video" by the Indian Air Force, indicating its promotional nature.
Some media outlets: such as ABP News and Zee News, initially misrepresented the video as "exclusive footage" or the "first footage which gives proof" of the airstrike.
In some cases: a disclaimer or clarification mentioning the promotional nature of the video was either flashed briefly or not provided at all.
